name: Datepixel: A Nopixel Dating Sim
description:
Welcome to Los Santos!

It's a city of passion, crime, passionate crime and other things! It's been a long and arduous journey to get here, so make the most of your time.

Meet all four of the romanceable residents of Los Santos, and all kinds of different side characters. Your choices will be the difference between life, death, love and hate!

NOTE: This game contains public domain and royalty free music from fesliyanstudios.com, gamesounds.xyz, and freesound.org.
